description: This Dashboard is used to visualise the metrics from the security reports of the Trivy Operator

panels.description: Total number by type of security issues identified in the cluster
panels.title: Number and Type of Security Issues

targets.expr: sum(trivy_vulnerability_id) by (container_name, image_repository, image_tag, severity, vuln_id, vuln_title, installed_version, fixed_version)

panels.title: Severity Breakdown of RBAC Security Issues

panels.description: Summary of RBAC risks. May group multiple RBAC misconfigurations under one result. Also, may not provide detailed metadata for every vulnerability found.
panels.title: RBAC Details

title: Trivy Operator Dashboard Custom
